Class Model

java.lang.Object
  Model
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelInterface
public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelInterface

Use this class to store all the memory and register info in one spot since the loader, interpreter, and simulator all need access to it.

Author:
#1Group

Field Detail

memoryArray

public java.lang.String[] memoryArray
The entire abstract machine's memory. Each string in the array will have a length of 4, representing the hex value stored there.

registerMap

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> registerMap
The map will store an integer denoting the register number and the string of hex for the registers.

conditionCodeRegisters

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Boolean> conditionCodeRegisters
The map will store a character denoting the CCR and the associated boolean is the state of that register.

hexStartValue

public java.lang.String hexStartValue
This string of four characters will have the start value of the instructions in hex.

programCounter

public java.lang.String programCounter
This integer will have the location in the array of the next instruction.

programName

public java.lang.String programName
The name of the program being loaded into memory. It is retrieved from the header record.

instructionLimit

public java.lang.Integer instructionLimit
The potentially user-defined instance of the maximum number of instructions allowed to be executed. Defined in the controller to be 1 to 2,147,483,647, or the default.

Constructor Detail

Model

public Model()
Constructor for the Wileven Machine model.
